title: Add Korean language to client
body:
Hey, 
So on the older client I was able to have my game in Korean through the locale.
However, with this new version, it doesn't seem possible to do so. In fact, all languages but Korean work...
I was wondering why it's the case, and if there would be a fix soon...

thx

replies.body: Currently, the [**NA region only supports English**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594) as an available language option. I believe the KR server is the only region that officially supports Korean.
when you say currently does it mean there might be a patch for it in the future?

I haven't heard anything about it being added in anytime soon, but there's always a chance something could change. Honestly, I'd suggest posting this over in [**Client Discussion**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) to draw a little more attention to this idea!
